title: Discussify - Social Network like Quora
description: Developed a web application inspired by Quora during a hackathon by TIAA company.Key features include user registration, post creation with a character limit of 2000.Implemented engagement tools such as comments, upvotes, downvotes, and trending posts based on categories.Focused on creating a user-friendly interface and fostering a vibrant online knowledge-sharing and discussion community.

title: â€¢ Blood Bank Management System
description: Developed an online platform for blood bank management.Implemented features include User Panel, Admin Panel, User Registration, View Personal Donation/Receive Details, Manage Stock, Manage Records, Account Settings, Track Users Activity Logs.
